titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar Club of Philadelphia Records, 1903-2011
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett December 2008

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Materials relating to the creation and subsequent activities of the Vassar Club of Philadelphia.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The Vassar Club of Philadelphia was founded in 1903. From 1967-2006, the club organized the Vassar Show House which raised more than 3 million dollars to provide scholarships for Philadelphia-area students attending Vassar College.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Materials relating to the creation and subsequent activities of the Vassar Club of Philadelphia. The first two boxes include materials of a general nature, such as minutes, reports, newsletters, pamphlets, directories, and correspondence. The other eight boxes contain documents relating to the Vassar Show House. Included are planning materials, newsclippings, brochures, scrapbooks, photographs, and other materials which provide information about the process of creating a designer show house, the programming surrounding each show house, as well as the histories of some of the houses themselves.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Laura Streett, November 2008. Updated September 2009 and May 2011.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Vassar Club of Philadephia, 2008-2011.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: The VHS tapes, floppy disks, and compact disks may require reformatting before use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar Club of Philadephia Records, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

Show House — Decorator Show Houses, by Tina Skinner, Melissa Cardona, and Nancy Ottino (Atglen, PA: Schiffer Pub., 2004).
